meanings.definition: The act or art of producing a picture, plan, or diagram with a pencil, pen, or other tool.
meanings.sent1: Her drawings of animals were displayed at the art show.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy looking at the detailed drawings in this book.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's drawings on the whiteboard always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: His drawings of the city skyline were so realistic, they seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: The drawings of the flowers were so colorful and vibrant.

meanings.definition: A picture or diagram produced by drawing.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a collection of ancient drawings on display.
meanings.sent2: She gifted me a beautiful drawing of a sunset.
meanings.sent3: The child's drawings on the wall added a touch of creativity to the room.
meanings.sent4: The drawing of the map helped us navigate through the forest.
meanings.sent5: His drawings of the stars in the night sky were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The selection of winners in a lottery or raffle.
meanings.sent1: The drawings for the raffle will take place tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I hope my lucky drawing gets picked for the prize.
meanings.sent3: The drawing for the grand prize caused much excitement among the participants.
meanings.sent4: Her drawing was the winning ticket for the vacation package.
meanings.sent5: The drawing of the winning number was met with cheers and applause.
